.. _coadd_1d_pipe:

coadd example: coadd_1d_pipe
============================

This example shows how to use nmrglue to coadd a series of 1d NMRPipe files.
All files matching the ``test*.fid`` pattern will be coadded into a file 
named ``coadded.fid``.  


[`source code <el/coadd/coadd_1d_pipe/coadd_1d.py>`_]

.. literalinclude:: el/coadd/coadd_1d_pipe/coadd_1d.py
